loans.name: Gulnora

texts.en: Gulnora is a young and successful young woman. She is 20 years old. Gulnora is not married and lives with her parents in the southern part of Tajikistan. She graduated from Pedagogical University. She works in a local school as a teacher of the young grades. She is a young and smart teacher. Gulnora always tries to develop her knowledge. She needs a computer because she wants to use new technology in her classes. Her salary is small and is not enough to buy a computer. She is asking for a loan of 1,500 TJS to buy a computer. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy a computer to use in her classes

loans.name: Mielyn

texts.en:
Mielyn is 31 years old and is very responsible with her household obligations since she has always been known to provide the best for her family. She currently lives with her husband and three children. She is a farmer who plants corn and beans.

Mielyn wants to increase sales. Consequently, she has requested a loan of PHP 9,000, which will enable her to purchase seeds, compost, and fertilizer, among other items, so that she can continue to put bread on the table in her home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for farm production

loans.name: Santos Jorge

texts.es:
Santos Jorge tiene 68 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el caserío de la Delicias, una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería ubicada a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la compra y venta de animales menores en la parte posterior a su domicilio, son una familia emprendedora, Santos ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecerlo a un mejor precio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Santos Jorge, 68, lives with his wife and children in the small village of Delicias, a rural area in the district of Oyotún. The population is dedicated to farming, sales, and ranching. It is two hours away from the city of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

Santos makes a living buying and selling small livestock behind his home. They are an enterprising family. Santos is requesting a loan of 1,000 PEN to buy nutritious food to fatten his animals and offer his customers a better price.

loans.use: to buy nutritious food to fatten his animals.

loans.name: Hayla Johana

texts.es:
Hayla Johana tiene 32 años de edad, vive junto a sus padres y dos menores hijos en el distrito de Pucará, una ciudad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de cafetos, arroz siendo la principal actividad de la población frutales y comercio de los mismos, ubicada a dos horas de la Provincia de Jaén, que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposo se dedican a brindar servicio de transporte público desde hace cinco años, su esposo maneja la mototaxi , sus pasajeros son los transeúntes de su distrito que solicitan el servicio a los caseríos aledaños, Hayla Johana también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores patos gallinas y cerdos, Ella ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de repuestos para su vehículo y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Hayla Johana is 32 years old and lives with her parents and two children in the district of Pucara, a city with a hot climate. Its population is involved in agriculture, especially the cultivation of coffee and rice. This cultivation and their trade are the main activity of the population. Pucara is located two hours from the province of  Jaén which belongs to the Cajamarca region in the northern highlands of Peru. 

Hayla Johana and her husband earn their living providing public transport. They have done so for five years. Her husband manages the motorcycle taxi. Passengers are pedestrians in their district who request the service to take them to surrounding village. Hayla Johana is also engaged in animal husbandry, raising ducklings, chickens, and pigs. She has requested a loan of 1,000 Peruvian soles to purchase replacement parts for her vehicle to generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase replacement parts for ger vehicle.

loans.name: Mary Luz

texts.es:
Mary es una mujer pujante, servicial y trabajadora, a sus 45 años de edad, es casada y madre de dos hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación.
Desde hace 20 años se desempeña en el campo de la confección, prestando el servicio de confección a terceros y a clientes directos, el oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica y trabaja sola todos los días, así genera los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.
Actualmente se motiva a solicitar el crédito para comprar insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, resorte, entre otros) esto le permitirá tener material disponible para cumplir con la entrega oportuna de los pedidos que tiene pendientes, logrando fidelizar sus clientes actuales.
Mary manifiesta que desea continuar realizando su labor con mucho empeño, pues quiere ampliar su negocio y poder generar oportunidades de empleo, además de garantizar una estabilidad económica para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mary is a thriving, helpful, and hard-working woman. At 45 years old, she is married and the mother of two children who she has brought out ahead with much effort and dedication.

For 20 years, she has worked in the field of dressmaking, providing dressmaking services through procurers and to customers directly. She learned the trade empirically and she works alone every day, thus generating sufficient resources to support her husband with the economic burden of their home.

Currently, she has motivated herself to request the loan to purchase supplies wholesale (cloth, thread, and elastic, among others). This will allow her to have materials available to complete the timely shipment of the orders that she has pending, fostering loyalty from her current customers.

Mary expresses that she wishes to continue performing her job with much determination. She wants to expand her business and be able to generate employment opportunities, as well as guarantee an economic stability to provide a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to purchase supplies wholesale (cloth, thread, elastic, among others).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Ruth Dalila

texts.es:
Ruth tiene 29 años de edad, vive en la colonia, solamente pudo estudiar hasta noveno grado en la escuela, tiene 2 hijos de 3 y 1 años de edad, está casada y su esposo se dedica a la albañilería. 

Actualmente Ruth se dedica a los oficios domésticos, pero conoce muy bien la actividad de comercialización, la venta de ropa de todo tipo, y se ha dedicado también al trabajo en tienda, no lo ejerce en este momento por el motivo de que sus dos hijos están muy pequeños, pero tiene la visión de continuar con dicho servicio, esto lo aprendió cuando se encontraba estudiando, ya que su mamá no tenía las condiciones necesarias para continuar pagándole los estudios, ahora los ingresos económicos para Ruth solo provienen de su esposo.  

Ruth solicita este préstamo para comprar materiales como arena, hierro, cemento y cerámica, ya que necesita mejorar su vivienda,  pues desea que sus hijos crezcan en una vivienda digna. 

Los propósitos de Ruth para futuro son, que sus hijos puedan obtener un educación que les permita desempeñarse en cualquier actividad cuando sean personas independientes, también desea tener un negocio que le genere mejores ingresos para ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Ruth is 29 years old, and she lives in the neighborhood.   She was only able to attend school up to the ninth grade. She has two children, ages 3 and 1. She is married, and her husband works in construction.

Currently, Ruth is a homemaker, but she is very familiar with the sales business, and selling every type of clothing.  She has also worked in a store, which she is not doing at the moment because her two children are very young, but she looks forward to continuing with this occupation.  She learned it while she was attending school, as her mother was not able to continue paying for her studies.  Currently, Ruth’s husband is her sole source of income.
 
Ruth is requesting this loan in order to purchase materials such as sand, iron, cement, and tile, as she needs to improve her home. She wants her children to grow up in a decent house. 

Ruth’s goals for the future are for her children to get an education that will allow them to work in any occupation when they become independent; and she also wants to have a business that will generate better earnings in order to help her husband with the family’s expenses.

loans.use: to purchase sand, iron, cement, and tile, in order to improve her home.

loans.name: Alba Liliam

texts.es:
Alba Liliam es una joven de 26 años de edad, con un grado de estudio de secundaria completa la cual no pudo terminar. Ella es casada con el que hasta hoy en día es su esposo el cual es agricultor, madre de 5 hijos quienes son menores y estudian en la escuela de la comunidad. En compañía de su esposo trabajan la agricultura involucrándose únicamente ellos 2 siendo su fuente de ingreso económico el cultivo de café rubro al que se dedica desde hace 10 años aprendiendo de sus padres. El terreno que trabajan es propio el cual lo adquirieron gracias a una herencia y la otra parte fueron una compra por lo que agradecen a Dios por ser tierras productoras de café ubicadas a un kilómetro de su casa de habitación a la cual se movilizan en el auto bus de ruta de la comunidad. 
Sus metas, planes y sueños mantener sus cultivos de café en excelentes condiciones, comprar más tierra para cultivarlo de café en una mejor variedad y de esa manera asegurar los ingresos necesarios para dar a sus hijos un nivel de vida distinto quienes quisiera que se prepararan con una carrera universitaria y que encuentren un buen trabajo para que tengan otros ingresos. Por lo que hoy en día ha solicitado apoyo económico el cual invertirá en la limpieza y compra de insumos agrícolas para abonar, foliar y pagar mano de obra para darle mantenimiento a la misma.
texts.en: Alba Liliam is a young woman of 26 years of age with a high school degree which she was not able to finish. She is married to her husband who is a farmer. She is a mother of 5 young children who study in the community's school. With her husband, and only the two of them, they work in farming. Farming coffee is their source of financial income, an activity she has been doing for 10 years, having learned it from her parents. The land they farm is their own thanks to having inherited part of it and bought the other part. They thank God that the land produces coffee and that it is located one kilometer away from their house, to where they go by bus from their community. Their goals, plans and dreams are to maintain their coffee crops in excellent conditions, to buy more land to grow a better variety of coffee, and in this way to insure the necessary earnings to give their children a different level of life. They would like them to be prepared for a college career and to find good jobs so they have a different income. Therefore she is requesting financial support which she will invest in cleaning and buying agriculture inputs to fertilize, foliar feed and pay laborers to maintain the land.

loans.use: To buy agricultural inputs to be able to attend and maintain her coffee crops

loans.name: Johan Camilo

texts.es:
El es camilo, lo que camilo quiere es  adquirir diversos conocimientos, aprovechando al máximo el tiempo, investigando a fondo diferente temas que le interesan y acceder en todas  las ramas que le sea posible.
ya que cree que para el mundo actual, es necesario que una persona tenga conocimientos múltiples, pues siempre sera bien visto, que se pueda desempeñar en cualquier función que le sea asignada, no necesariamente laboral, esto siempre llevara a tener nuevas experiencias. 
La meta inmediata es iniciar los estudios de mecánica automotriz, formarse en este campo de aprendizaje, pues es un tema que le llama mucho la atención, sobre todo el tema de conocer partes que componen los motores y el funcionamiento e importancia de cada una.
Lo que le gusta a camilo desde temprana edad y le ha interesado el tema de vehículos, las mecánicas y en general artefactos que tengan que ver con movimiento manual, electrónico y eléctrico y tal vez aquí encuentra la relación al gusto y afición al skate, deporte extremo que distrae los días, lo apasiona y lo llevo a sentir gran adrenalina e interés por las ruedas.
Lo que motiva a camilo es que cada vez piensa en la  gran afición: el skate, lo entusiasma un sueño y es  poder combinar los estudios con su afición, y poco a poco se van formando preguntas, de como tener la idea de crear un nuevo aparato o maquina  que convine los estudios y preparaciones con el deporte favorito.
En 2 años a camilo le gustaría tener el propio negocio de arreglo de vehículos y fabricación de accesorios únicos y diferentes a lo común, de lujo y exclusividad, para obtener fama y popularidad en el trabajo, poder enseñar a otros, pero sobre todo darle la oportunidad a jóvenes sin experiencia desafortunada mente en este país, las oportunidades están  limitadas para ellos y lo que se debe hacer es aprovechar la energía,  pero sobre todo la creatividad que tienen.
sin embargo para llegar a ello hay que pasar por varios pasos y a esto se llega mediante la practica, así que primero debe iniciar trabajando en algún sitio que le de experiencia, indagar sobre tantos lugares famosos y reconocidos que principalmente hay en bogota, para lograr trabajar con alguno de ellos.
En este momento para camilo seria de gran ayuda el subsidio  kiva ya que los padres serian los encargados de realizar los pagos de las mensualidades y como el hasta ahora esta empezando el primer semestre aun le falta dos mas para poder terminar y los gastos en cada semestre incrementarían.
texts.en:
This is Camilo. What Camilo wants is to acquire various skills, making the most of his time and thoroughly exploring different subjects that he's interested in, so he can get into every possible field.
He believes that in today's world it is necessary for a person to have knowledge of multiple areas, because they will always be well-accepted and will be able to tackle any task that they're assigned, not necessarily work-related. This will always bring them new experiences.
His immediate goal is to begin his studies in auto mechanics and get a degree in this field of expertise. This is a subject that he's very interested in, especially in regards to knowing the parts that make up the engines, how they work and how important each one of them is.
From an early age, Camilo has been interested in cars, mechanics and, in general, devices that have to do with manual, electronic or electric movement. Perhaps herein lies the connection to his enjoyment and his penchant for skating, an extreme sport that is a hobby and a passion for him and that brings him a great deal of adrenaline and interest in wheels.
What motivates Camilo is how enthusiastic he gets everytime he thinks about his biggest hobby: skating. His dream is to combine his studies with his hobby. Gradually he begins to ask himself how to get an idea to create a new device or machine that combines his studies and his training with his favorite sport.
In two years, Camilo would like to own his own business repairing vehicles and manufacuring unique accessories that are different from the ordinary ones, luxury and exclusive. That way he'll become well-known and popular in his trade and he'll be able to teach others, and above all he'll provide job opportunities for young people with no experience. Unfortunately, in his country they have limited opportunities, and their energy and especially their creativity need to be put to use.
Nevertheless, in order to get there he has to go through several steps, and that takes practice. Therefore, first he has to start working some place where he'll get experience and ask around about so many well-known and renowned places that are mainly in Bogota, so he can get a job in one of them.
At the moment, the loan would be of great help to Camilo, because his parents would have to pay for his tuition fees. Since he's currently beginning his first semester, he still has two more to go, and each semester the costs would increase.

loans.use: to pay for one semester's tuition.

loans.name: Ara Poty Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Ara Poty está en el 2º ciclo  del programa de Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Cada una tiene su emprendimiento en el que invierten su mejor esfuerzo para salir adelante.
Una de las integrantes la Sra. Ninfa quien se dedica  a la  venta de productos y artículos en general para el hogar, y cuenta que con mucho sacrificio está saliendo adelante, pero que lo hace por ayudar a sus seres queridos a que no les falte nada.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos varios para la venta, como ser jabones, edulcorantes, galletitas y demás, y de esa forma seguir trabajando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The group Ara Poty is in their 2nd cycle of the women entrepreneurs program where they all work and help each other get ahead. Each one has their own business venture in which they give their best efforts to come out ahead.

Ninfa is one of the members who sells products and general household items and has made a lot of sacrifices to come out ahead, she does it for her loved ones so they don’t lack anything.

She is requesting this loan to invest it in the purchase of various products for sale such as soap, sweetener, cookies and more. This way she can continue working as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy soap, sweetener, cookies and more.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
La señora Cecilia tiene una peluquería en su casa, la cual está bien equipada y con una importante clientela ya formada que ella con sacrificio se ha ido formando.
Comenta que su marido también le ayuda, y que él tiene un camión en el que hace fletes, y así se ayudan a mantener la casa.
La Sra. Cecilia pide este préstamo para poder comprar un terreno para poder ampliar su peluquería y de esa forma seguir trabajando como lo viene haciendo, y también agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo.
texts.en:
Cecilia has a hair salon in her house. It is well-equipped, and has an important client base already established, that she has made sacrifices to build. 

She says that her husband also helps her—he has a truck with which he delivers freight, and this helps them to maintain their house.
 
Cecilia is requesting this loan in order to be able to purchase a plot of land so that she can expand her hair salon, and continue working in the same way. She is thankful for the opportunity that she is receiving.

loans.use: to purchase land.

loans.name: Micaela Bastidas Group

texts.es:
La socia Martina pertenece al banco comunal MICAELA BASTIDAS, él banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Martina tiene 39 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 02 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz,leche,golosinas,gaseosas entre otros, a la vez la socia se dedica  a la venta de caldos por la mañana, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de leche y azúcar para su negocio.
El niño que sale agachado en la foto es hijo de uno de los socios del banco comunal.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Los demás socios se dedican la venta de ropa, carpinteria, productos de belleza, venta de ropa(lencería).
texts.en:
Martina is a member of the Communal Bank “Micaela Bastidas”, which is located in the District of Cusco in Cusco Province, Department of Cusco.

She is 39 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has two children. Martina divides her time between her daily activities and her grocery business. She sells different types of products such as rice, milk, snack foods, sodas, and other items. At the same time, she sells shoes in the mornings. Martina has been in business for some time and is doing very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work each day. She is a responsible and industrious individual who works in this manner so that her family can get ahead.

Martina is requesting a loan in order to buy milk and sugar to sell in her business. The guy crouching down is the son of one of the borrowers of the communal bank. She is grateful for the loan that has been provided and promises to complete her payments according to the established terms.

The other members sell clothes, work in carpentry, sell beauty products, and sell lingerie.

loans.use: to buy milk and sugar to sell in her business.

loans.name: Yamileth Del Socorro

texts.es: Yamileth es egresada de la carrera de contaduría pública, labora en una editorial como asistente de promoción, ella es una joven emprendedora que anhela culminar sus estudios y poder alcanzar la satisfacción después de todo el esfuerzo entregado. Requiere de este crédito para tramitar el titulo de su carrera a travez de un curso que tiene un costo elevado, que solamente con financiamiento podrá cubrir, por lo que está muy agradecida por esta oportunidad de crédito.
texts.en: Yamileth is a graduate of public accounting and works in an editorial as an advertising assistent. She is an enterprising young woman who longs to complete her studies and be able to achieve satisfaction after all the effort she committed. She requires this loan to register her degree through a course that has an elevated cost. She will only be able to cover the cost with financing, she is very thankful for the opportunity of this loan.

loans.use: to pay for the qualification course.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is 30 years old, married and has two children. She supports four people in her family. She operates a boutique, which she has been doing for six months. 

Catherine requested a loan from VisionFund, which she will use to buy cosmetics and clothes to sell. She will use the anticipated profits from her expanded business to pay school fees for her children. She hopes to be successful in her business and be self reliant.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Santiago Dagoberto

texts.es:
Santiago tiene 42 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato electricista, está soltero y no tiene hijos, en casa viven su madre y su hermana y son las únicas personas que dependen de él.

Santiago se dedica al comercio, tiene un puesto de venta en el mercado de su ciudad, él tiene 7 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, este negocio era de su madre, pero ella se lo encargó a Santiago porque ella ya no podía administrarlo por la edad.
Santiago también obtiene ingresos de su trabajo como electricista de la alcaldía donde él vive. 
Su trabajo en el mercado le queda a 1 kilómetro de distancia, los que recorre en bicicleta, en el negocio se involucra su hermana quien lo cubre cuando él se va a su otro trabajo de electricista.

Él necesita de este crédito para comprar material para  mejorar  su vivienda, comprará cemento, ladrillo, hierro, y pagará la mano de obra requerida para mejorar la casa.
El préstamo le ayudará a mejorar su vida, porque tendrá mejor vivienda para él y su familia.  

Santiago sueña con llegar a tener un trabajo más estable que le proporcione mejores ingresos y darle a su familia una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Santiago is 42 years old. He studied in a school for electricians. He is single and has no children. His mother and sister live in the house and are his only dependents.

Santiago is a merchant. He has a sales stall at the market of his city. He has had his business for 7 years. It was his mother’s at first but she turned it over to Santiago because she was no longer able to manage it due to age. Santiago also earns an income from his work as an electrician in the town where he lives.

Santiago’s market stall is about 1 kilometer away and he rides his bicycle there. His sister is also involved in the business and covers it when he is out working as an electrician.

He needs this loan in order to purchase material to improve his dwelling. He will buy cement, bricks and iron and will pay the required workforce to make the improvements.The loan will help him to improve his life because he will have better living conditions for himself and his family.

Santiago dreams of having a more stable business that will provide higher earnings and give his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase cement, bricks and iron in order to make home improvements.

loans.name: Roy

texts.en:
Roy is a 36-year-old single mother of four children aged 12, 9, 7, and 4 years. She owns a retail business, which is located in a trading center, and works 7 days a week and 16 hours a day.
 
She is also a farmer, which she started in 2009 and from which she gets additional income for her family. She joined this retail business so as to earn a living and to also be able to pay tuition for her children. She often sells her goods to people around the trading center and the surrounding villages.

She hopes to use the loan to boost her retail business by buying more items, especially the daily household use items like rice, posho, sugar, and salt, among other items that are sought after by the local community. This will increase her income, which will in turn improve her family's standards of living.

She faces a challenge of limited capital and clients who take goods on credit and fail to pay. She is described as a honest and hardworking woman.

She asks lenders to give money to clients who have the capacity to avoid stressing their guarantors. Pictured is Roy and the Ugafode credit officer.

loans.use: To buy retail stock

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is 43 years old and has three children. She is a hard working mother who runs a small variety store in her village. 

Anita aims to improve her stock so she can satisfy her costumers' demands. She requested a loan for 35,000 PHP, which she will use to buy stocks of grocery items and Avon products to sell. She hopes to earn a higher income, sustain the needs of her family, and support the education of her children.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items and Avon products to sell

loans.name: Félix De Jesús

texts.es:
Félix de 70 años de edad, no estudio, solamente aprendió a leer ya que cuando sus hijos estudiaron decidieron enseñarles a ellos. Es casado, su esposa no trabaja tiene 74 años de edad, tiene 7 hijos todos acompañados, solo uno vive con él pero tiene su hogar a parte, todos mayores de edad. Con el viven dos nietos; son hijos de dos hijas que trabajar y ellos los cuidan, uno de ellos estudia y el cliente trabaja para ellos y su esposa.

El cliente es jornalero, trabaja cuando hay temporadas en la finca cortando café o chapodando. Don felix desde siempre se ha dedicado a este trabajo, desde que sus padres lo llevaban con ellos a la finca  a cortar café; cuando se caso dado que no pudo estudiar se decidió buscar trabajo en la finca y de ello poder mantener a su familia. El trabajo le queda a cuatro kilómetros y cuando esta la temporada el horario es de 8 a 4 pm.
Con el préstamo, el cliente comprara material para ampliar su casa que le construyo por parte de la iglesia y caritas,  ya que su casa para el terremoto se le derrumbo y ahora él quiere ampliarla ya que es pequeñita, con esto mejorara las condiciones de su familia, ya que cuando sus hijos lo visitan, comentan de que no tienen suficiente espacio en su casa.
Los sueños son poder reparar su casa para tener un mejor hogar ya que su familia, es un poco grande y cuando se llega la navidad que todos le visitan el dice, que aveces les toca dormir en el corredor por el poco espacio que tiene su casita, de esta forma el espera darles un mejor espacio en su casa, a sus hijos y nietos.
texts.en:
Félix, 70 years old, did not go to school and only learned to read because when his children went to school they decided to teach him. He is married. His wife does not work and is 74 years old. He has 7 children who all have partners. Only one lives with him, but has a separate home. All of them are adults. Two grandchildren live with him: they are children of the two daughters who work and they take care of them. One of them is in school. Félix works for them and his wife.

Félix is a day laborer. He works when there are seasons on the farm harvesting coffee or pruning. Félix has always done this work, ever since his parents took him with them to the farm to harvest coffee. When he married, given that he was unable to study, he decided to look for work on the farm and from that be able to support his family. The work is four kilometers away and during the season the schedule is from 8 to 4 pm.

With the loan, he will buy material to expand his house, which was built for him by the church and Caritas, since his house was destroyed by the earthquake. Now he wants to expand it because it is very small. With this, he will improve his family's condition, since when his children visit him, they note that they do not have enough room in his house.

His dreams are to be able to repair his house in order to have a better home, since his family is a little large, and when Christmas comes and they all visit him he says that at times they have to sleep in the hallway due to the small amount of space his little house has. In this way he hopes to give his children and grandchildren more space in his house.

loans.use: to buy materials to expand his small house

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 26 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Mary Jane has an herbal medicine business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional stocks of herbal medicines to sell.

Mary Jane has been in this business for two years. In the future, Mary Jane would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of herbal medicines to sell.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio tiene 65 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está acompañado desde hace 7 años y su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios domésticos y tiene un trabajo eventual de lavar ropa en la colonia donde vive,  tiene 2 hijos que están estudiando, el mayor de ellos no es hijo biológico pero Julio lo ha criado como si lo fuera.

Julio trabaja en una alcaldía donde labora desde hace 12 años como barrendero, la disciplina del cliente y su responsabilidad, le ha permitido estar durante muchos años laborando, el trabajo le queda a 3 cuadras de su casa los que recorre caminando y trabaja 8 horas al día, antes de dedicarse a esta labor Julio era agricultor.

El crédito que está solicitando lo necesita para comprar material para  mejorar  su vivienda, ya que actualmente en la que vive es mixta, la mitad es de adobe y la otra mitad es de lámina y él desea complementarla toda de adobe, por lo tanto comprará adobe de tierra,  madera,  y pagará la mano de obra requerida para mejorar la casa.

Julio  desea  seguir trabajando para algún día hacer su casa de un mejor material para que su familia tenga una vida digna, también desea darles el estudio a sus hijos para que se superen.
texts.en:
Julio is 65 years old. He studied until the sixth grade. He has had a partner for seven years and his life companion is a domestic worker and has an occasional job washing clothes in her neighborhood. He has two children who are students. The oldest is not his biological son however Julio has raised him as if he were.

Julio works in a city center where he has had a job for 12 years as a street sweeper. His sense of discipline and responsibility have enabled him to work for many years. His job is about three blocks from his house and he walks there and works 8 hours a day. Before getting this job, Julio was a farmer.

He needs the loan he is requesting in order to purchase materials to improve his home since the place he currently lives in is mixed, half is adobe and the other half is metal sheets and he wants to convert it completely into adobe. Consequently he will buy adobe soil, wood and pay for the work force needed to improve his house.

Julio wants to continue working until one day he will have a house made of better material so that his family will have a decent life. He also wants to provide his sons with an education so they will succeed in life.

loans.use: to purchase adobe soil and wood to improve his home.

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.en: Mahbuba was born in 1986. She is married and has two little children. Her husband is a migrant in Russia. Mahbuba began her business selling perfumes three years ago. She sells her goods in a shop that is located in the center of her region. She manages the business alone. With the profits from her business, she buys food items and clothes for her children. She dreams of offering a good education to her children. Mahbuba wants to increase her assortment of goods for the new season because in March, there are a lot of customers in her shop. Many men buy perfume for their mothers and wives for Women's Day. She is asking for a loan of 6,000 Somoni to buy perfumes for the new season. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy perfumes for the new season

loans.name: Santusa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTA ROSITA DE LIMA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Santusa tiene 59 años de edad es casada y tiene 3 hijos,la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de ropa y tambien tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de comida,la socia vende chompas,pantalones y blusas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la ropa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar chompas,pantalones y blusas. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The group member belongs to the communal bank, “Santa Rosita de Lima”.  It is located within the district of Cusco which is in the province and department of Cusco. 

Santusa is 59 years old, and married with three children. She sells clothing and she also has a small food sales business. She sells sweaters, pants, and blouses, working from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. She has been in this business for several years, and it is going well for her. 

Her dream is to have a shop where she could sell the clothing. She is requesting a loan to purchase sweaters, pants, and blouses. She is happy about the loan, and she promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to purchase sweaters, pants, and blouses.

loans.name: Anipa

texts.ru: Анипе 58 лет, вдова, одна воспитывает сына, супруг умер в 1996 году. У Анипы - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Анипа занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 19 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Анипы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 20 овец, также имеется земельный надел размером 4,50 ГА, где в основном сажает фасоль для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Анипа обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Анипа планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение внука.
texts.en: Anipa is 58 years old, a widow, a single mother with a son whose husband died in 1996. Anipa has a secondary education. The primary income for the family is Anipa's work in farming and animal husbandry. She started 19 years ago when she bought 10,000 KGS worth of cattle. Because of Anipa's hard work, her farm now has a dairy cow, twenty sheep, and a 4.50 hectare plot of land where she grows beans. Her monthly income is 10,000 KGS. In order to further develop her farm, Anipa approached Bai-Tushum for a loan to buy cattle for breeding. Anipa plans to invest profits she makes from the loan into increasing her livestock, and she plans save money to educate her grandson.

loans.use: buy cows

loans.name: Goretti

texts.en:
Goretti, a 55-year-old widowed mother of three from Embu, owns a business selling cereals and other grains. She also practices farming, a business that supplements her income. She currently lacks the capital needed to purchase items in bulk to restock her store. 

With a loan through VisionFund Kenya, Goretti will be able to purchase cereals in bulk when she finds goods at low prices. She will then be able to have a fully stocked store, which will attract more customers, generate sales, and create more profit due to a lower cost of goods sold. The additional income created will allow her to reinvest in her business, meet the needs of her family, and educate her children through college. 

In the future, Goretti would like to run her business successfully and lead a decent life.

loans.use: to purchase cereals in bulk

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en: Catherine is 41 years old, married, and supports seven members of her family. Her spouse, Sang, helps in fending for the family too. Catherine is in the dairy farming business in Kapsabet and is served by Vision Fund's Kapsabet office. This has been her income-generating business for the last five years and she earns an average monthly income of KES 15,000. She plans to use the KES 30,000 she is borrowing to purchase a dairy cow. Her dream is to educate her children and also improve the welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Faith

texts.en:
Faith is a lady of 31 years who is married to Timothy. She is a mother of three children. She raises chickens and does knitting in Limuru. She has been in this business for six years now and earns a monthly income of 8,000 shillings.

This will be Faith's second loan with VisionFund Kenya. She plans to use the entire loan to buy chicks for her business. In the future, she wants to educate her children and expand her business.

loans.use: To buy chicks

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is 50 years old, married, and supports a family of 5 members. Her spouse also helps to support the family. They are blessed with 4 children aged between 10 and 17 years old. Esther owns a retail shop in Kiptagich which has been in operation for a period of 7 years, and earns an income of KES 8,000. She has asked for a loan of KES 30,000 from VisionFund Kenya and hopes to purchase more stock for resale. The profits she earns will be used to repay the loan. Her dream is to excel in life.

loans.use: To purchase stock for her retail shop

loans.name: Sarafina

texts.en: Sarafina is 24 years old, and a single mother of one child. She has a retail shop in Naivasha which she has been running for three years. She has applied for her second loan from VisionFund Kenya to enable her to buy stock such as rice, sugar, and flour - among other items - for her retail shop. With the anticipated profits, Sarafina plans to invest more in her business. In the near future, she hopes to expand her business to improve her living standards and educate her child.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, flour, and other items.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is 51 years old and married with six children. Elisa works very hard to provide for them.

Elisa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stocks of groceries to sell.

Elisa has been in this business for 15 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future, Elisa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Shirinkan

texts.ru: Ширинкан 53 года, вдова, после смерти мужа сама воспитала 2 детей. У Ширинкан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Ширинкан занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 30 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Ширинкан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 0,60 ГА поливной земли на которой ежегодно сажает фасоль для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 16,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Ширинкан обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку бычков для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Айнагул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на свадебное мероприятие для старшего сына.
texts.en: Shirinkan is a 53-year-old widow. After her husband's death, she raised two children. Shirinkan has a secondary education. The family's primary source of income is Shirinkan's work in farming and livestock. She started 30 years ago when she bought 1,000 KGS worth of cattle. Because of Shirinkan's hard work, her farm now has a dairy cow and 0.60 hectares of irrigated land where she plants beans. Her monthly income is 16,000 KGS. In order to further develop her farm, Shirinkan approached the bank Bai-Tushum for a loan to buy bulls.  Shirinkan plans to use profits from the loan to increase her livestock, and she plans to save money for her eldest son's wedding.

loans.use: buy bulls

loans.name: Vilma Gloria

texts.es:
Vilma tiene 47 años de edad, tiene 8 hijos, ella es madre soltera pero muy emprendedora, solo pudo estudiar hasta quinto grado y se ha esforzado por sacar adelante a su familia por sí sola, dos de sus hijos son mayores de edad y ya formaron sus propios hogares, sus otros 6 hijos dependen de ella.

Vilma se dedica al comercio desde hace 15 años, ella sale todos los días, por las tardes a vender tamales y pan a los demás cantones aledaños, esta actividad es un poco cansada, pero el deseo de sacar adelante a su familia la motiva, esta actividad la aprendió de su madre que también se dedicaba al comercio.

Ella está solicitando este préstamo a CrediCampo, para cubrir una deuda que tiene, ya que hace un año se le presentó un problema grave en la familia, por lo que recurrió a solicitar que se le prestara dinero, de tal manera que hoy tiene que devolverlo y por el momento no cuenta con la cantidad exacta, por lo que ella necesita que se le ayude, ya que también una parte la invertirá en su negocio para poder seguir trabajando y que no le falte nada a su familia. 

Vilma sueña con tener un negocio estable, de donde pueda obtener ingresos para brindar el estudio a sus hijos y cubrir los gastos del hogar, también desea tener una pequeña granja para tener ingresos económicos extras.
texts.en:
Vilma is 47 years old. She has 8 children and is a single mother who is very enterprising. She could only study until the fifth grade and has made an effort, on her own, to help her family get ahead. Two of her children are adults and already have their own households. Her remaining six children are dependent on her. 

Vilma has been a merchant for 15 years. She leaves every day in the afternoons to sell tamales and bread in adjacent neighborhoods. This job is a bit tiring but the desire to help her family get ahead motivates her. She learned this business from her mother, who was also a merchant.

She is requesting this loan from CrediCampo in order to cover a debt that she incurred a year ago when she faced a serious family problem and needed to request a loan. Consequently she now has to repay it and at the moment does not have the exact amount. Thus she needs help and will also invest a part of this loan in her business so that she can continue working and supporting her family.

Vilma dreams of having a stable business that will enable her to earn enough to provide her children with an education and cover household expenses. She also wants to have a small farm in order to earn a supplementary income.

loans.use: to pay a pending debt.

loans.name: Nuridin

texts.ru:
Нуриддин добродушный и жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 54 лет. Он женат и имеет детей. Нуриддин живёт со своей женой в небольшом доме в сельском посёлке. Чтобы прокормить свою семью он занимается своим бизнесом. Нуриддин  занимается дехканством и животноводством. У него имеется земельная площадь. Из общей площади земли, некоторая часть земли составляет богарные земли, а остальная площадь это поливные земли. На этой земле Нуриддин занимается выращиванием моркови, картошки и зерновых культур. А его жена помогает ему ухаживать и растить скот. Так как земельная площадь у них большая, они также пасут на ней своих скот. 

Бизнес животноводства приносит хороший доход, поэтому Нуриддин хочет расширить этот бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Для этого он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Нуриддин очень надеется на положительный результат и  заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Nuridin is a good-natured and cheerful 54-year-old man. He is married and has children. Nuridin lives with his wife in a small house in a rural village. To feed his family, he does business. Nuridin works on a collective farm and with livestock. He has a plot of land area. Some of the land is irrigated while the rest is not. Nuridin grows carrots, potatoes and grains. His wife helps him take care of and raise cattle. Since they have a lot of land they also graze their cattle on it. 

The livestock business brings in a good income, so Nuridin wants to expand the business by increasing their herd. Therefore, he turned to Arvand to get a loan to buy cattle. Nuridin is hoping for a positive outcome, and he thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: José María

texts.es:
José de 53 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar,  está acompañado  la esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, han procreado 3 hijos en este matrimonio de los cuales los tres viven en hogares apartes se acompañaron y se fueron de la zona. Actualmente, José solamente vive con la esposa.

Don José  se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 14 años de edad, este trabajo se lo enseño el papá para que en un futuro se pudieran defender. El lugar de trabajo le queda a una distancia de 10 minutos  y él viaja a pie, José  solo a esto se dedica con la ayuda de la esposa,  en horario de las 6 de la mañana hasta las 10 am.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para sacar los cultivos y tenerlos en la casa, pagar quien le lleve el maíz para la casa en la carreta y también pagar una máquina para que le desgrana el maíz. Este préstamo le ayudara mucho ya que solo él y su esposa se le hace  más difícil hacer las cosas, por lo que tiene que pagar quien le ayude.

Los sueños que tiene es que siempre Dios le preste vida para seguir cultivando la tierra y tener como llevar el sostén de la casa  ya que la ganancia es cuando ya está en la casa el maíz, ya que esta seguro el que deja para el consumo y lo que se deja para la venta.
texts.en:
José, 53, didn't have the opportunity to go to school.  He's married and his wife is a homemaker.  They had three children together, all of whom are married and live in their own homes in other areas.  Currently José and his wife life alone.

José has worked in agriculture since he was 14.  His father taught him the work so he could support himself in the future.  It takes him about 10 minutes to walk to his fields.  This is his only job; he works from 6 a.m. until 10 a.m. and his wife helps him.

The loan he's requesting from CrediCampo is to harvest the crops and get them to his house, to pay the person who takes the corn to his house in a cart, and to pay to have the corn shucked by machine.  This loan will help him a lot because it's hard for José and his wife to do everything alone, so he has to pay for help.

José's dream is that God will always give him the life to continue farming the land and have a way to support his household.  His profits come when all the corn is at his house, because he's sure about how much he'll have for home consumption and how much for sale.

loans.use: to harvest his crop and to pay for labor

loans.name: Guloro

texts.ru:
Гулоро умелая швея. Она шьёт прекрасные национальные платья для женщин. Также Гулоро умело вышивает на платье бисера, бусы, создаёт декоративные цветы из них и украшает ими платье. Гулоро швея со стажем. У неё талант к этому мастерству. Как подчеркнула сама Гулоро, у неё был особый интерес к шитью, которая превратилось в ее основной бизнес и доход. Ее наставница сумела передать своё мастерство и воспитать в Гулоро хорошую швею. 

Поначалу Гулоро пользовалась швейной машинкой, которая арендовала у соседей. Но потом приобрела  новую собственную швейную машинку. Но так как потребность на качественное шитьё и вышивку возрастает, решила на приобретенный кредит  купить современную машинку. Этим она и её «маленький бизнес» смогут «выжить» и продолжат обслужить большее количество клиентов, зарабатывая нужную сумму на образование детей и благополучие своей семьи. Она очень надеется, что приобретённый кредит станет основой ее новых возможностей и откроет двери в светлое будущее. Заранее благодарит «Кива за содействие и поддержку.
texts.en:
Guloro is a skilled seamstress and sews beautiful traditional dresses for women. She also skillfully embroiders the dresses with different kinds of beads, creating flowers and other decorative designs. She is an experienced and talented seamstress. Guloro says she has a special interest in sewing and turned it into a business. Her mentor was able to pass on skills and help her become a good seamstress.

Guloro used a sewing machine she rented from her neighbors before she bought her own. But as the demand for high-quality sewing and embroidery began to increase, she decided to apply for a loan to buy a modern sewing machine. This will help her small business to survive and allow her to serve more customers and earn enough money to support her children's education and her family's well-being. She hopes that the loan will be the foundation for new opportunities and open doors to a brighter future. She thanks Kiva for the support.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Mt Ulunguru Group

texts.en:
Rose, who is in her early forties, is married with three children who are still in school. She has been running a poultry business for one year now.  She works from 8 am to 8 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Rose's 14th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans for buying and selling chicken layers (which are for meat only not for laying eggs). She also sold cosmetics and bought chicken feed for her poultry business and has paid back all her loans successfully. She appreciates everyone who has supported their group. Rose used the profit to pay school fees, bought a plot of land, and covered household expenses. She dreams of building her own house.  

Rose will share this loan with her loan group Mt Ulunguru which has seven members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy chicks and chicken feed.

loans.name: Marziya

texts.en: Marziya was born in 1985. She is divorced and has a child. She has been working in a local school for more than 2 years. She teaches world history as well as Tajik history to her students. Marziya has a higher education degree, and is smart woman. She is going to build a new house little by little as her present house is in poor condition, and she sees no future in it. Marziya is asking for a loan of 1,200 USD to buy building materials for her new house. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy building materials for her new house

loans.name: Sadafmo

texts.en: Sadafmo is a 43-year-old woman who always strives for the well-being of her family. She is married and has 4 children. Sadafmo is a smart woman. She is a teacher at a local school, where she has been working for more than 7 years. She has a lot of pupils and loves them very much. She tries to give them good knowledge. Her husband is a director of the school where Sadafmo works. They live happily in a house which is in bad condition. Sadafmo is going to repair her house. She is asking for a loan of 5000 Somoni to buy building materials such as cement, wood, paint, etc. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as cement, wood, paint, etc.

loans.name: Jemina

texts.en:
This is Jemina. Her previous loan was a big help to her business because she was able to buy needed products for her variety store. The loan also helped her to meet her household expenditures. She and her husband are helping each other to provide for their everyday needs. 

Jemina would like to apply for another 50,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages, and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store the better. She hopes that having more items to sell will result in better profits. Additional profits will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart. 

Jemina dreams of expanding her business. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is 26 years old, married, and blessed with two children aged 4 and 1 1/2. She owns a mobile phone accessories shop located in Kabarnet, which has been in operation for a two years earning an income of KES 25,000.

She is now serving her third loan of KES 100,000 with VisionFund Kenya and she intends to purchase more phone accessories and increase her business float. The profits she earns will be used to provide a quality education for her children. 

Her dream is to build a permanent house.

loans.use: To purchase phone accessories

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.en: Muhabbat was born in 1964. She is married to her husband Esanaly. Muhabbat has five children. She is also a successful business woman. Six years ago, Muhabbat began her business in animal husbandry. She feeds cows and sheep. Muhabbat feeds cattle during a month and then sells it in a local market. Muhabbat has regular customers thanks to the good condition of her cattle. She is going to increase the number of her cattle she has to sell. She is asking for a loan of 3,000 TJS to buy cattle for increasing her working capital. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy cattle for increasing her working capital.

loans.name: Johnstone

texts.en:
Johnstone is a 44-year-old, hard-working gentleman, married to Beatrice and a father of five. His children are ages 14,12,10,7 and 1. He has run a motorcycle transport business for the last four years with a monthly income of about KES 30,000. He learned about Vision Fund from a loan officer.
Johnstone has acquired his second loan of KES 30,000 which will help him purchase spare parts and pay for servicing the motorcycle. He plans to use the proceeds to pay school fees for his children. He hopes to buy another motorcycle from his accumulated savings. He is an industrious gentleman who is determined to achieve his goal and improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and pay for servicing his motorcycle.

loans.name: Henny

texts.en:
As a married mother of six children, Henny works hard to support her family.

She has an oyster culture business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from food vending.  Henny is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF in order to buy materials needed for her oyster culture business.

Henny has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her oyster culture .

loans.name: Nedia

texts.en:
Nedia is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell for her business.

Nedia has been in this business for 13 years. Nedia earns additional income from her oyster-culture business.

Nedia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business and support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Silvia tiene 45 años de edad, solo pudo estudiar hasta de segundo grado de educación básica, tiene 2 hijas de 19 y 14 años de edad, una está estudiando bachillerato y la otra va a la escuela, Silvia está casada y su esposo se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos.

Silvia desarrolla la actividad de comercio, tiene una tienda y en esta actividad la apoyan sus dos hija al igual que su esposo, el trabajo lo aprendió por la necesidad de ayudar a su esposo, pues él era el único que aportaba los ingresos al hogar, ahora los 2 aportan para ayudar a sus hijas a continuar con sus estudios. Su esposo se dedica a la siembra de granos básicos para el consumo de su familia y también para comercializar y obtener más ingresos económicos. 

Silvia solicita este crédito, para comprar más productos y surtir su tienda, ya que hay clientes que le piden más productos y ella no los tiene, desea comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, Etc. Ya que esos productos son los que más demandan en su tienda.

Ella pretende que su negocio le permita satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes como también las de su familia, y que sus dos hijas tengan la oportunidad de sacar una carrera con la que puedan superarse.
texts.en:
Silvia, 45, was only able to finish second grade.  She has two children, ages 19 and 14; one is in high school and the other one attends school.  Silvia's married and her husband works growing basic grains.

Silvia's a merchant.  She has a store where her two daughters and her husband help her.  She learned the job because she needed to help her husband when he was the only one bringing an income into the household.  Now they both help their daughters continue with their studies.  Her husband grows basic grains for household consumption as well as for sale, to earn more income.

Silvia's requesting this loan to buy more products and stock her store, because she has customers who request products she doesn't have.  She wants to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergent, etc., because customers request these products most.

She wants her business to satisfy the needs of her customers and her family.  She also wants her two daughters to have the chance to have professions and improve themselves.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, and detergent

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a 39-year-old married man with four children who are 15, 10, 7 and 5 years old and all of them attend school. He also has two other dependents who are his relatives.

He is a produce dealer in Kyango and has worked 6 days a week and 10 hours a day since the year 2000. He also carries out farming. He was motivated by the desire to get additional income. He hopes to use the loan to boost his produce and farming businesses and he has a dream of being the leading supplier of produce in Kyango.

He usually supplies his goods to fellow traders and farmers in Kyango and Kampala. He faces the challenge of customers who take goods on credit and refuse to pay plus the unfavorable weather conditions that affect his businesses. He is described as an honest and hardworking man.

loans.use: To buy agricultural produce to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Zaynab

texts.en: Zaynab is widowed. She was born in 1954 in the north part of Tajikistan. Since her husband's death she has been the sole support for her two children. Zaynab has been busy selling dried fruits in the local market for more than 20 years. She has her own selling place in the market. Zaynab's profits improve her living conditions little by little. She must organize the wedding parties of her son and her daughter. With this aim she is going to increase her working capital and develop her business. She is asking for a loan of 4000 Somoni to buy dried fruits for increasing working capital. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy dried fruits for increasing working capital

loans.name: Dinah

texts.en:
Dinah is 66 years old, married and supports two members of her family. Her children are grown ups and are independent. Dinah owns a retail grocery shop and has been running it for over 10 years, earning an income of KES 10,000 monthly.

With her fourth loan of KES 30,000 from VisionFund Kenya, she hopes to add more stock to her shop.  The profits she earns will be used to repay the loan and look after the welfare of her family. His dream is to excel in all sectors of business and in life.

loans.use: To add more business stock to her grocery shop.

loans.name: Margaret Nduta

texts.en:
Margaret is 54 years old, and a single mother of three children, supporting two.
She has a business selling second-hand furniture which she has been running for three years. She has applied for her first loan from VisionFund Kenya to enable her to buy more furniture to sell. With anticipated profit, she plans to buy materials to complete building rental houses.

In the near future, she hopes to see her business grow to greater heights and her children well educated.

loans.use: To buy second hand furniture.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip is 53 years old, married and supports three of his children who are 17, 15 and 13 years old.  He is a farmer in Kiptagich practicing mixed farming.  He has been in the farming business for over 15 years, earning an income of KES 15,000 monthly.

Philip wants to use his fourth loan of KES 75,000 from VisionFund Kenya to purchase animal feeds as well as outputs for his farming activities. From the profits he earns, he will repay his loan and pay school fees for his children.

His dream is to improve his family's living standards.

loans.use: To purchase outputs and animal feeds

loans.name: Keti

texts.en: Keti is a hardworking woman with one child living in Fort Portal, Uganda. She has owned a bar since 2012 and gets supplementary income from a pool table business. She started this business to improve her economic status. She desires to have a well-stocked bar that will attract more customers and increase her income, although she is challenged by competition and inadequate capital. Keti is requesting a loan to repair her pool table and buy beer to sell.

loans.use: to repair her pool table and buy beer to sell.

loans.name: María Matilde

texts.es:
María de 62 años de edad, no asistió a la escuela, por lo que no sabe leer, ni escribir, esta casada y tiene 5 hijos, todos ayudan en las labores de manejo de sus animales y cultivos. Tambien asisten a la escuela sus hijos.

 María, tiene 20 años de estar dedicada al cultivo de maíz, yuca, y a la criá de ganado de repasto, Aprendió el trabajo, por la misma necesidad de subsistencia, ya que no puede conseguir un empleo formal, debido a su falta de preparación académica.  Por la mañana llevan sus animales al potrero y luego se dedican al trabajo en sus cultivos, para eso ayudan todos los miembros de la familia.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar 3 novillos de engorde en  repasto y espera que esto cambie su situación económica, ya que al engordarlos, podrá tener alguna ganancia extra, para la alimentación de su familia 

María, esta planificando trabajar muy duro para ahorrar y poder mejorar su casa, para vivir mas cómoda con su familia.
texts.en:
María is 62 years old. She did not attend school, and thus she does not know how to read or write. She is married and has 5 children. All of them help with the work of managing her animals and crops. Her children also attend school. 

María has dedicated herself for 20 years to growing corn and yuca, as well as raising livestock on pastureland. She learned how to do this work because of the need to support herself, since she could not obtain a formal job due to her lack of schooling. In the morning, they take the animals to the enclosure, and later they work on their crops. All of the family members help with this. 

The loan that she is requesting from CrediCampo is to buy 3 calves to fatten up on grass. She hopes that this will change her economic situation, since when they are fattened up, she will have extra earnings to help feed her family. 

María is planning to work very hard to save up to improve her house, in order to live more comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to buy 3 calves to fatten up on grass.

loans.name: Rahab

texts.en:
Rahab is 58 years old, widowed and blessed with seven children although she is currently supporting the two who are in school.

Rahab runs a farming business in Naivasha, which she has practiced for six years. She has applied for her first loan from VisionFund Kenya to enable her buy a cow. With the anticipated profit, she plans to pay school fees and improve her standards of living.

In the near future, she hopes to have a better life.

loans.use: To buy a cow.

loans.name: Boanerges Antonio

texts.es:
Boanerges de 31 años de edad, es una persona acompañada que convive junto a su esposa e hijos, estudio hasta noveno grado. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. Junto a su esposa que le apoya en la actividades agrícolas y en el ordeño de los animales que poseen (vacas) 

 
Boanerges junto a su esposa se dedican a la agricultura, oficio que aprendió de su padres;  para llegar a la parcelas camina 4  Km y trabajan durante la mañana y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos y a cuidar las vacas que poseen


el préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar unas novillas que un futuro le ayudaran a incrementar la producción de leche para la venta y obtener mejores ingresos 

Él  planea que con los ingresos que obtiene de la venta de leche, de la siembra y del préstamo para la compra de las novillas; podrá construir en un futuro una vivienda digna para su familia.
texts.en:
Boanerges, 31 years old, lives with his wife and children. He studied through ninth grade. He gets up at 5:00 a.m. with his spouse, who helps him with the agricultural tasks and milking the animals they have (cows).

Boanerges and his wife work in agriculture, work they learned from their parents. In order to get to the parcels of land, they walk 4 km. They work during the morning and his wife performs household tasks and takes cares of the cows they have.

The loan he is requesting is to buy some heifers that will help them to increase milk production in the future in order to sell it and obtain a better income.

With the income he obtains from the sale of milk, the planting, and the loan to buy the heifers, he plans to be able to build a decent house for his family in the future.

loans.use: to buy some heifers that will help him and his wife to increase milk production in the future

loans.name: At

texts.en:
At is a hardworking entrepreneur who operates a farming rice business in Kampong Cham province as her major source of income. She is 36 years old and is married with six children. She has been farming for nearly 20 years and earns approximately 8,000 KHR per day. 

At dreams of having a proper house for her family, but she doesn't have enough capital to realize her dream. At this time, she is asking for a loan from HKL to buy a piece of land keeping for constructing a home later when she saves enough money. In the future, At wants to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land keeping for constructing a home later when she saves enough money.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 53 years old and married with ten children. Three of her children are in school.

Lucia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Lucia has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 24 years and also earns an income from pig fattening. Lucia aspires to save money to expand her business and continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Jeofrey

texts.en: Jeofrey, a married man with five children, lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a farmer who mainly deals in banana growing for both commercial and home consumption. He also has a retail shop for extra income. He ventured into the banana business 11 years ago to earn a living after realizing that there is a ready market for this product. Weather changes and the banana bacterial wilt affect his productivity yet he hopes to become a leading banana producer in his area. Jeofrey needs the loan to rehabilitate his banana plantation.

loans.use: to rehabilitate his banana plantation.

loans.name: Hofizkhon

texts.en: Hofizkhon was born in 1987. He is a hardworking man. He is married and his wife is a housewife. Hofizkhon began his business in animal husbandry 10 years ago. His parents were poor people and he needed money. Hofizkhon feeds cows and sheep. He has a good opportunity to develop his business in animal husbandry as he lives in a rural area. Hofizkhon likes his job and works with pleasure. He began building a new house some years ago but there is still some work left to finish it completely. He is asking for a loan of 5,000 Somoni to buy building materials such as wood, cement, soil, bricks, etc. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as wood, cement, soil, and bricks

loans.name: Nildo

texts.es:
El Sr  Nildo tiene su familia integrada por su esposa y un hijo,  proviene de familia muy humilde. Muy joven estudió la profesión de electricista  que le dio la posibilidad de ganarse la vida honradamente, formó su hogar y ayudó a su esposa  a seguir estudiando. Gracias al gran esfuerzo puesto ella cuenta con un trabajo estable  percibiendo un salario fijo, ayudando a su marido a solventar los gastos de la casa. 
Nunca tuvieron casa propia, vivieron en alquiler por  varios años, hace muy poco tiempo tuvieron la oportunidad de adquirir su vivienda propia. Nildo cuenta con las herramientas necesarias para realizar su trabajo, una motocicleta que utiliza también en sus actividades para ganarse el pan de cada día, sin embargo aún le faltan algunas herramientas para poder ofrecer un servicio completo a su clientela. Es por ello que recurre a la institución a fin de acceder a un crédito para la compra de las mismas.
texts.en:
Nildo has a family that includes his wife and one son. He comes from a very humble family. When he was very young, he studied the electrician profession which gave him the opportunity to make a honorable living. He built his home and helped his wife to continue studying. Thanks to her considerable efforts, she has a stable job with a fixed salary which helps her husband to cover their living expenses. They never had their own house and lived in rentals for several years. They recently had the opportunity to purchase their own home. 

Nildo has tools needed to complete his work and a motorcycle that he uses for work to earn their daily bread. However, he is still missing some tools that would enable him to offer complete services to his customers. For this reason, he is applying to the institution in order to receive a loan to buy the tools.

loans.use: to buy tools to use in his services.

loans.name: Samia

texts.en:
Samia is a 38-year-old married mother of six children who has been working in selling chicken eggs and Thyme production for ten years. She is a hard worker who puts in so much effort to help her husband in developing their living.

Samia is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to establish a chicken farm where she can produce and sell her own chicken eggs and increase her family's income. Samia hopes to expand her working zone, especially after establishing her own farm in the future.

loans.use: to establish a chicken farm where she can produce and sell her own chicken eggs.

loans.name: Flora Virginia

texts.es:
La socia  Es la señora Flora Virginia, ella pertenece al banco “LUZ DEL SUR” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú.

La socia sigue dedicandose a la docencia universitaria,la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicandose a su trabajo el cual le trae satisfaciones tabnto economicas como personales ,la socia desea podere seguir trabajnod para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.

La socia está solicitando el préstamo para comprar material didáctico para su trabajo.

La socia está muy agradecida con KIVA y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Flora Virgina's a member of Luz del Sur Communal Bank in the city of Cusco, Peru.  She's still working as a college professor.  She has been in this job for a long time and it continues to give her both personal and financial satisfaction.  She wants to keep on working to she can continue supporting her family.

Flora Virginia's requesting the loan to buy teaching materials for her job.

She's very grateful to Kiva and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy teaching materials

loans.name: Mable

texts.en: Mable is a 57-year-old lady from Kakamega County married to Norbert who is a businessman in the same town. They have four children. She sells cereals, a business she has done for the last 25 years, earning an average income of KES 20,000 per month. She is taking her fifth loan of KES 25,000 with VisionFund Kenya to buy more stock of cereals. Some of the profits will be saved and some used to repay the loan. Her dream is to prosper.

loans.use: to buy more stock of cereals

loans.name: Sony

texts.en:
Sony is 55 years old and the married mother of 10 children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and earns additional income from oyster culture. Sony is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment for her fishing business.

Sony has been sustaining her business activities through her past four loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 51-year-old widow. She is blessed with four children and supports two of the children who are in school.

She is running a poultry and farming business in Naivasha, which she has practiced for six years. She has applied for her first loan from VisionFund Kenya to buy chickens and chicken feed. With the anticipated profit, she plans to pay school fees and invest more in her poultry business.

In the near future, she hopes to see her business grow to greater heights.

loans.use: To buy chicken and chicken feed.

loans.name: Dilbara

texts.ru: Дилбаре 49 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Дилбары - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Дилбара занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 8,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Дилбары, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 теленок, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 13,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Дилбара обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Дилбара планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Dilbara is 49 years old, married and raising four children with her husband. Dilbara has received secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, Dilbara raises livestock, having started 20 years ago by buying livestock for 8,000 KGS. Thanks to Dilbara’s hard work, her farm now includes two dairy cows, one calf, and 10 sheep. Her monthly income is 13,000 KGS. In order to develop her farm further, Dilbara has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution for a loan to increase livestock by buying cows. Dilbara plans to invest the resulting revenue in a further increase of livestock.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Amistad Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Amistad  está en su ciclo número 9º del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 2 de ellas se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Silvia, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos. A través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y la aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza, pero igualmente está consciente de que este trabajo y esfuerzo que está haciendo debe ser continuo y permanente para lograr un éxito total, ya que con ello podrá dar un mejor bienestar a su familia. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que  tiene venta de ropas, también se debe destacar el trabajo de las asesoras, quienes hacen un seguimiento permanente de capacitaciones y verificaciones que de alguna manera exigen y al mismo tiempo incentivan a las mujeres a luchar para poder superar la pobreza.
La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de prendas variadas como remeras, short entre otros, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group called Amistad is in its ninth cycle of the program of the committee of women, where all of the members work and help themselves come out ahead. They are performing a survey for the elimination of poverty, and two of the members find themselves below the poverty line.

One of the members is Silvia, who in her last survey showed to have a poverty level in the second level. Through the continuous effort and work and the determination of the behavior vital to be a successful woman, she finds herself improving her poverty situation. Also, she is conscious that this work and effort that she is doing needs to be continuous and permanent in order to achieve total success. With it she will be able to give a better life to her family.
