For work, she says that she has a clothing shop. Also, she should highlight the work of the consultants who do permanent monitoring of training and verification that in some way challenge and at the same time encourage women to fight to be able to overcome poverty.

Silvia is requesting this loan to purchase a variety of clothing items like t-shirts and shorts, among others, which will help her to solidify her business plan which will help her to improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing items to sell.

loans.name: Blanca Marilu

texts.es:
Blanca de 33 años de edad, apenas estudio sexto de primaria,  su pareja trabaja como albañil su hija mayor se acompañó y el otro estudia, ella trabaja como ordenanza en la unidad de salud. Ella llego al trabajo por su buena reputación y recomendaciones de los vecinos y se siente muy contenta con su trabajo, pues le queda a menos de una cuadra de su casa

El dinero del préstamo lo utilizara para comprar materiales, como lamina y mano de obra para su casa, pues  es de adobe  y las paredes ya se las están acabando las abejas y  tiene que botarlas.

Ella sueña con que su hijo estudie  y llegue a ser enfermero, mientras ella lucha por mantenerse en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Blanca, age 33, has only studied through the sixth grade of primary school.  Her partner works as a bricklayer.  Her oldest daughter has a partner and her other child attends school. 

She works as an assistant in a health care unit. She was hired because of her good reputation and the recommendations of her neighbors; and she is very happy with her job, as it is less than a block from her house. 

She will use the money from the loan to purchase materials such as sheeting and to pay workers for her house, as it is made of adobe and the walls are already being ruined by bees, so she has to remove them. 

She dreams that her son will study and become a nurse, while she works hard to maintain her job.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as sheeting, and to pay workers for her house.

loans.name: Serliana

texts.en: Serliana is one of TLM individual clients. She is a 33-year-old woman, who is married to Remigius, a 41 year old labourer. They are blessed with five children: Roland, twelve; Rendi, nine, both are elementary school students; Riko, six, who is in early childhood education; Clarisa, four; and the last one is Catrin, who is two years old. Serliana has been running a kiosk business since last year. She decided to run the business in order to assist her husband in fulfilling the family needs. They spent their own money IDR 3.500.000 to initiate the business. The kiosk is selling daily needs to their neighbourhood such as sugar, instant noodles, cooking oil, shampoo, soap and detergent etc.  Serliana plans to add more stock to her kiosk such as kerosene and gasoline. Therefore she applied for an individual loan of IDR 3.000.000 to TLM. The loan will be spent on cooking oil, gasoline, kerosene, instant noodles and eggs etc. She is hoping the loan from TLM will help her to improve her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, gasoline, kerosene, instant noodles and eggs for her general store.

loans.name: Román Alcides

texts.es:
Román es un joven muy luchador de 28 años de edad, por motivos económicos no pudo estudiar, ya que su familia no tenia los recursos para darle la oportunidad, por eso tuvo que incorporarse a las actividades productivas a temprana edad.  Él esta casado, su esposa realiza los quehaceres del hogar y le ayuda también en las actividades agrícolas, tienen tres hijos, ellos se encuentran estudiando.

Román realiza jornales en la elaboración de teja, en tejeras del cantón y también en época seca (verano) tiene su propio negocio de teja, ademas, trabaja en la agricultura en la época lluviosa.

En el negocio de teja tiene mucha experiencia, trabaja en esto desde que recuerda, su padre fue quien le enseño el oficio , al cual agradece, porque es de esta actividad productiva con la que lleva el sustento a su  familia. Trabaja de lunes a sábado; de 7:30am a 4:30pm. En el negocio le ayuda un hermano.
El préstamo lo utilizara en la compra de insumos( barro, tierra blanca, zacate, leña, entre otros materiales, que son necesarios para la elaboración de teja. En esta época seca, es la idónea para la elaboración, ademas ya cuenta con pedidos de clientes. Para aprovechar la oportunidad que se le presenta, ademas,  este año necesita reparar el horno que esta en malas condiciones, en este realiza  ¨el quemado¨ de las tejas. 
Su sueño es ampliar el negocio de tejas, comprar un vehículo con el cual poder transporta los pedidos, facilitando la comercialización y también le generaría mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Roman is a 28 year old young man who was not able to attend school due to financial reasons.  His family did not have the resources to provide him the opportunity so he had to go to work at an early age.  He is married and his wife does the housework and helps him with his farming.  They have three children and they are in school.

Roman makes tiles at local factories and during the dry season (summer) he has his own tile business.  He also farms during the rainy season.

He has lots of experience in the tile business and has been working on this as long as he can remember.  His father taught him the trade and he is grateful because this is how he supports his family.  He works Monday through Saturday from 7:30 am to 4:30 pm.  His brother helps him.

He will use the money from this loan to buy supplies (clay, white dirt, sod, firewood, and other things he needs).  This dry season is the perfect time for making tiles.  He also tells us that he has customer orders.  He also needs to repair his kiln which is in bad shape.  This is where he fires his tiles.

His dream is to expand his business, buy a vehicle so he can transport his orders, making his sales easier and also generating more income.

loans.use: to buy supplies.
